comments.message: Hi Howard, interesting post! Any chance you could find an image to go along with it? Images help grab attention and tell a story with higher impact. You should be able to use the Update Entry button on the right of your post and follow the instructions to add images from there. We know occasionally people have issues uploading images so let us know by hitting the Feedback button at the bottom of most pages of our site if you face any problems. Looking forward to seeing more of your inspiring insights on OpenIDEO. And here's some tips on adding visual goodness to your idea: http://ideo.pn/vis-uals plus more on evolving your thought-starter: http://ideo.pn/oi-evolve

description: Auto LED flashing strobe light with motion detector to be worn on garments for social distancing.
summary: Small postage stamp size ( Indicia ) flashing LED light , with a built in motion detector/range finder, to be worn on outer garments hats/goggles/protective garments/etc. EXAMPLE:  I wear a led pin that flashes when you get too close too me.  You wear a LED pin that flashes when I get too close to you. You don't have to be polite and ask me to get out of your face, and, I don't have to be polite and ask you to stay out of my face.
title: Social Distancing - LED strobe Light/with motion detector .
